sentence.Network_cn: 他们为自己的历史传统深感自豪。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French heritage, from heriter 'inherit' (see heritable)

entry.def: A country's heritage is all the qualities, traditions, or features of life there that have continued over many years and have been passed on from one generation to another.

example.ex: The historic building is as much part of our heritage as the paintings.
example.tran: 这座历史建筑和这些画一样，都是留给我们的文化遗产的一部分。

example.ex: ...the rich heritage of Russian folk music.
example.tran: 俄罗斯民间音乐的丰富遗产

means.word_mean: 1. practices that are handed down from the past by tradition;
2. any attribute or immaterial possession that is inherited from ancestors;

sentences.sentence: "my only inheritance was my mother's blessing"

means.word_mean: 3. that which is inherited; a title or property or estate that passes by law to the heir on the death of the owner
4. hereditary succession to a title or an office or property

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 名词或动词后缀,表示"状态,总称"; 2. [做的]状态,过程; 3. 名词后缀,表示"费用"; 4. 名词后缀,表示"场所,物品"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dam+age状态,总称→n.损害,伤害
carry携带,运送+age费用→carriage运费
post邮件+age费用→n.邮资
rail铁路+age费用→n.铁路运输,铁路运费
tow拖+age费用→n.拖[船,车]费
water水+age费用→n.水路运输,水运费
anchor铁锚+age场所,物品→n.停泊地点;抛锚地点
append附加+age表示名词→n.附加物
bever饮,喝+age场所,物品→n.[水,酒等之外的]饮料
cot小床,小屋+age场所→cottage村舍,小屋
herit继承+age场所,物品→n.遗产,继承物;传统
hermit隐居士+age场所,物品→n.隐居处
lug拖拉+age物品→需要拖运的物品→luggage行李,皮箱
vill茅屋+age场所,物品→n.村,村庄
wreck残骸+age场所,物品→n.残骸,碎片

stems_affixes.value_cn: 优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad+vant=van前卫,先锋+age状态,总称→n.优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
dot打点,打盹+age状态,总称→n.老年糊涂,溺爱
drain排干+age状态,总称→n.排水;下水道
foli叶+age状态,总称→n.叶子[总称]
marry结婚+age状态,总称→marriage
mile英里+age状态,总称→n.里程
patron赞助人+age状态,总称→n.赞助,惠顾
percent百分比+age状态,总称→n.百分率
pilgrim朝圣+age状态,总称→n.朝圣
short短+age状态,总称→n.不足,缺乏
ton吨+age状态,总称→tonnage吨位
verbi=verb词语+age状态,总称→词的状态→冗长
vis看+age状态,总称→n.脸,面貌
pill抢夺+age状态,总称→n.&v.抢劫,掠夺
en进入+vis看+age[做的]状态→进入看的状态

Sentence.sentence: We write to preserve our family histories so our children and grandchildren can learn and appreciate their heritage (传统).
What are you going to do with the old house you are in heritage from your grandfather?

sentences.en: The ancient buildings are part of the national heritage.
sentences.cn: 这些古建筑是民族遗产的一部分。

jushi.english: The ancient buildings are part of the national heritage.
jushi.chinese: 这些古建筑是民族遗产的一部分。

jushi.english: We must all take care to preserve our national heritage.
jushi.chinese: 我们必须都注意保持我们民族的优良传统。
